body.content:
Good Day,

I'm very excited by this... after a number of months I've been able to complete a deal with NBC and Fox affiliate news sites, to spotlight a photography business (like yours) and showcase what they do. 

It seems you could be the right fit to spotlight, but I would have to verify some information first.

Even though it gets published nationally, this would still bring in new business locally.

Can I speak to the business owner?

Thank You

Stanley Cheung

Noble Network

You are not on an email list, but if you don't want to me to follow-up on this issue, please respond back 'stop'

header.subject: Featuring Shane Durrance Photography in NBC & Fox News Sites article...
